mapper.sql: id, career_id, course_id, del_flag, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id
mapper.select: SELECT nin_career_course.id AS id, career_id AS careerId, nin_career_course.course_id AS courseId, nin_course.course_name AS courseName, nin_course.house_type AS houseType, nin_course.must AS must, nin_course.course_time AS courseTime, nin_course.start_time AS startTime, nin_course.end_time AS endTime, nin_course.week_time AS weekTime FROM nin_career_course, nin_course WHERE nin_career_course.del_flag = 0 AND nin_career_course.course_id = nin_course.id AND nin_career_course.career_id = #{careerId}
